Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Hillary Clinton's statement by suggesting that she said "We're all going to hang from nooses" if Donald Trump won the election.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the statement attributed to Hillary Clinton.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the fabricated quote attributed to Clinton is true without providing any credible sources or evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the "we're-all-going-to-hang-from-nooses" quote did not appear in any leaked or disclosed emails from Clinton to Donna Brazile.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the origin of the fake quote, such as it being a fabrication posted on an obscure website.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting a misleading and baseless statement as if it were true.
Understate: There is no understatement bias present in the claim.
